verbose_text: Given that VEGF is an important cytokine secreted by MM cells and BMSCs, that VEGF secretion can stimulate IL-6 secretion, and that IL-6 can activate the JAK2 / STAT3, PI3K / AKT and ERK1/2 signal pathways to trigger MM cell proliferation and survival XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, the effect of DCZ3301 on VEGF and IL-6 secretion was explored.
